alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:04PM AKST until December 23 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Baranof Island, including Sitka and Port Alexander. Eastern Prince of Wales Island, including Edna Bay, Klawock, Craig, and Hydaburg. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dry snow will accumulate quickly with snowfall rates as high as an inch per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
